activateguild_help: Set/remove the user who's limits are used for the current guild
activateguild_mode: Whether to set, remove, or view guild's activation
activateguild_in_server: You may only activate while in a server
activated_by:
This guild is currently activated by {{user}}
You have used {{amount}} activations
activateguild_no_role: You must have a role that increases your limits to activate a guild
activateguild_limit: You have reached your limit of {{limit}} activated severs
gamelist_help: Ouput the list of games available, searchable with any text
status_help:
Create a status message, you must provide game and IP
e.g. {{example}}
status_missing_args: You must provide a game type and server IP in the format {{correct_command}} instead of {{command}}
use_gamelist: You may view and search game types with {{command}}
offline:
The server ({{host}}) was offline or unreachable. Check:
- You are using the correct server type
- You can connect to your server
- Queries are enable in your server config
- The bot isn't being blocked by firewalls or DDOS protection
statusclear_help: Clear all status messages from the channel
statusmod_warning: Changes will not take effect until after the next automatic status update
statusrefresh_help: Force the bot to delete statuses in channel and create a new message next time it automatically updates
